alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Ohio; Ripley; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:27AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, RIPLEY, DEARBORN, SWITZERLAND AND NORTHERN BOONE COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EDT... At 1027 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Versailles to Oldenburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesville, Lawrenceburg, Greendale, Aurora, Rising Sun, Bright, Hidden Valley, Versailles, Milan, Osgood, Dillsboro, Moores Hill, Guilford, Wilmington, Logan, Pleasant, Manchester, French, Sunman and Hartford. This includes I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 152 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
